petri.api

Class GameMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • petri.api.GameMode

  • public class GameMode
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class that contains all of the necessary methods for GameModes. This class should be overridden by the user to enable
    Author:
    Cody Swendrowski

      • isOver

        public boolean isOver(int x,
             int y)
        Checks every button to see if mouse is hovering over a Button.
        Parameters:
        x - X position of mouse
        y - Y position of mouse
        Returns:
        True is mouse is hovering over a Button in the current mode

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Automatically sets the toString() to the class's simple name. Used to switch GameModes in GameEngine .setCurrentGameMode(String name).
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
